definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: Cambodia is now a constitutional monarchy where executive power is held by the prime minister.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨現在是一個君主立憲制國家，首相行使行政權。

sentences.english: Constitutional monarchy began after the Glorious Revolution in 1688.
sentences.chinese: 君主立憲制是從1688年的光榮革命後開始。
